text: Mark Alan Webber (born 27 August 1976 in Queanbeyan, New South Wales) is an Australian Formula One driver. At the German Grand Prix, he became the first Australian to win a race since Alan Jones in .AUSmotive.com - Webber wins in Germany! == Racing record == === Career summary === Season Series Team Races
